title: Too short in length and sleeves
body: I thought this jacket was adorable and it is however, it is basically a crop jacket and the sleeves were about 2 too short.  I usually wear L - XL and I ordered an XL and it was too small.  I guess I didn't notice that the model wearing it for the advertisement was so tiny.

title: Extremely unique and beautiful!’
body: This lace denim jacket is stunning! It isn’t going to provide warmth, but that was not what I was looking for. I wanted light and lacey to wear over dresses. It is perfection!  Nice quality denim and lace!

title: Worthy of all 5 stars
body: Never given 5 stars out but this Jean jacket is not your average jean jacket. The lace is soft the denim is soft and honestly it’s beautiful. Not super boxy on either. It’s really all about the lace!

title: Down- played yet dressy
body: Would've given this 5 stars but for a lingering chemical smell on the garment after unpackaging. Fortunately following a single laundry the smell was gone. The coat gives a distressed looking lacy sophistication and boho accent. It will coordinate many pieces together. Size Small is very loose.

title: Wore to a concert
body: I got this to wear to a Madonna concert for that eighties lace vibe. I did add some rhinestones to the buttons, which amped it up even more. Fit is great and it was very comfortable. I appreciated the pockets. It was a bit scratchy in certain places probably because of the lace, but for the look and price, I didn't mind. I got compliments on it and really love the jacket overall.

title: Gorgeous jacket just as pictured
body: This is probably one of the most beautiful jackets I happened to come across in searching for something else.  It is exactly as shown.  Totally worth the price.  I think it runs a little big. I ordered a large and returned it for a medium, debated on returning for a small.

title: Exactly as photo
body: Looks exactly like photo. I’m usually a L or XL in jackets and ordered an XL. It fits and is oversized but not as oversized as I would prefer. Will be cute in spring summer. Has very strong odor and has been hanging up for 3 days airing out and being sprayed with febreze.

title: Very unique and pretty.
body: I have received numerous compliments. It really is a beautiful and unique jacket. It is a bit rough with Jean shredding and scratchy but still well worth the purchase. It runs big and fits a bit boxy especially the arms.

title: Very nice Lace and Distress look
body: The media could not be loaded. Im 5'5 weight 145lbs....size M...but I ordered a size S , could have ordered a XS for a tighter fit..But will stay with the S , to have more room to move around....Love this look ; LACE with Distress Jean...very modern and goes with all color of Jeans...LOVE IT....

title: Great item
body: Absolutely 💯 happy. The jean material was lighter than pic but not a big deal. Very worth the price.  It will be a big hit when I wear it out! I'm excited to see what people say...delivery time was fast n even a day early!

title: very cute, very unique
body: it is exactly as pictured. As others have said it is a little scratchy but i will wear long sleeves underneath

title: Love this jacket LOVR
body: Love the style

title: It's a beauty.
body: This is a great style of jean jacket.  It's an eye catcher.

title: It is exactly as advertised.  The jean quality is good. Pockets are on the inside.
body: The media could not be loaded. The jean quality is good and soft. There are pockets are on the inside to put your keys and cellphone.

title: I absolutely love my denim lace jacket
body: This jacket is so very comfortable and light weight. It’s gorgeous. I’ve never had a denim jacket. That was so pretty. I highly recommend it.🥰

title: Boho vintage look!!!
body: OMG!!! This is my new favorite jacket! I normally wear a medium in my denim jackets but I bought a xl for a loser fit. You can buy your normal size and will fit fine. I received sooo many compliments..it looks exactly like the picture.

title: Purchase your regular size
body: Unfortunately I listened to some of the reviews and sized down.  What a mistake that was.  I bought me regular size and it fits perfect.  Definitely scratchy on the arms so I suggest wearing a longer sleeve top.  Otherwise very pretty jacket.  Good Quality except for scratchy arms.

title: Returned.  Not a flattering fit  very boxy..
body: It fits like a box..  not flattering

title: SUPER CUTE
body: Worth it very pretty good material fast delivery.. order one size smaller

title: Gorgeous
body: What a beautiful jean jacket!!!!!!! I purchased one for my daughter and one for me.  We love this jacket, it’s just like the picture.  Runs a little large. I got a medium size for me and a large for my daughter.

title: Smells really bad!!! Like mildew!!
body: Nice jacket but smells really bad!!

title: Very Appealing
body: This is now one of my favorite jackets. Received a ton of compliments. It does run big. I’m an XL and I order a large based on some of the reviews I had read.

title: Very Cute
body: Oversized comfy fit

title: Perfect jacket
body: The jacket was perfect for my denim wedding

title: Love my Jacket...
body: Love the jacket... Order 1 size smaller...

title: Beautiful Jacket!! Lots of complements o it!!
body: So flattering on!!

title: This jacket is simply out of this world, it’s soooo gorgeous, and I truly love wearing it!
body: I love the lacework, how beautiful!

title: Shabby chick jacket
body: This jacket is classy....it is advertised other sites for MUCH MORE!!!!

title: So cute!
body: I love, love this jacket! It's so unique and adorable. It fits well in a slightly oversized style. The lace is a bit scratchy but I can deal with it for how cute it is.

title: Awesome
body: Exactly what I was looking. Needed a summer jacket that didnt trap the heat in :). Exactly as pictured. Its an oversized fit and based on description I ordered a small and still fits oversized but its a perfect oversized look, its not too big. Normally wear a Small/Medium. I ordered a Small.

title: Lovely
body: I absolutely love the jacket. It fits comfy, which is exactly what I was looking for. If you want snug, size down. This is super fun and girly.  💕

title: Love this jacket 🙏
body: Love this jacket very much my style

title: price, on time delivery
body: Jacket has a very bad smell. not Quality

title: Obsessed, the cutest jacket ever.
body: Perfect for summer when you wear a backless or strapless outfit and just need a little more coverage

title: SO CUTE & CURRENT!  LOVE IT!
body: This jacket is adorable!  Love it!

title: Really Nice
body: The coat is exactly like expected.  It's really pretty....and the size is right on.  I wear a xx in coats, that's the size I bought. ( If you want to be able to button up the coat....buy one size bigger) I cant wait to wear it outside !! Its worth the price..I'm glad I bought it.

title: Fits Large
body: Great jacket! I just had to order a smaller size. Love the style!

title: Received many compliments!
body: Looks great and fits great. Looks exactly like the picture.

title: Very elegant!
body: This is a beautiful jacket and so elegant. You could dress it up or wear casual. I love it!!

title: Nice jacket for the price, order one size down
body: Beautiful jacket for the price. I am 110 pounds and extra small was a nice fit for me, roomy so this runs on the large side.

title: Cute but itchy
body: I live this. It’s cute and original. I gave a 4 star rating, because it is itchy. From the lace.

title: Stylish, great price & fits well. Love this jacket!😇
body: No dislikes! It's a beautiful lace & demin jacket. I am 250 lbs, I purchased size XXL (2XL) and it fits great over my summer dresses and t-shirts. Love it😇

title: Defective after a long wait.
body: Very unique jacket...I just wish it worked out.  I waited so long for this... 3 weeks to be exact.  When I finally received it, I was SO excited to wear it, only to find a gash in the mesh on the back...so unfortunately I will be returning it.  I'm wondering if I should reorder a new one in a larger size, as I like a more oversized look.  For the record, I am 52, 128lbs, 33-29-38.  I ordered a small.

title: Beautiful and unique!
body: I absolutely love this jacket! Was a bit skeptical when I ordered it because there weren't too many reviews but it's even nicer in the real 🌎!! Casual but so unique. I will be using a very gentle cycle or even hand wash it because it looks delicate but I don't care! I Love it!! I ordered a large and it's a perfect fit. By the way, it does say this jacket is cropped and it's on the shorter side but not your typical short (where's the rest of your jacket cropped 🤣) Not a fan of that. So the images advertising this jacket is truly how it fits. Short but not in my mind cropped

title: Itchy and I don’t like the fit
body: The lace material is very scratchy! The fit is bulky not slim like it’s made for men and the sleeves are huge. I’m not sure if I want to keep it.

title: JUST BUY IT ALREADY
body: This jacket is so much more than I expected. It’s absolutely beautiful & definitely a head turning piece of clothing. I haven’t loved a jacket this much I’m so excited to wear it!

title: WOW! GREAT IDEA
body: Beyond gorgeous,  exciting  way to RENEW a design,  THIS PERSON IS AN ARTIST

title: A Must Have
body: It's just lovely
